name: Red and Blue ~ Cycles of Existence (itch)
name_original: Red and Blue ~ Cycles of Existence (itch)
description:
On the planet Somelody...

When she was a child, Saliéka almost drowned in the sea near Seahant Island, but a mysterious beautiful woman saved her. Her name is Taralise.

Since that day, Saliéka has been madly in love with her.

Now that she is 16 years old, Saliéka wants to find Taralise to confess her love to her, but it will end in tragedy.

Dual Language Screen (FR-EN)
